description: Explore how Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are revolutionizing the digital book industry by addressing issues of ownership, piracy, and valuation. This transformation presents new opportunities and challenges for authors, publishers, and readers, and could redefine storytelling, collectibility, and community interactions in the digital age.
keywords: NFTs, digital books, eBooks, blockchain, digital ownership, publishing industry, digital assets, NFT opportunities, digital book ecosystem, cultural impact of NFTs
title: The Rise of NFTs in the Digital Book Industry: Revolutionizing an Age-Old Medium
